final_answer.precision_note: Inputs 1.50 A and 30.0 min have 3 s.f. Result is rounded to 0.889 g.

method: Convert time to seconds: 30.0 * 60 = 1800 s. Calculate charge: Q = I * t = 1.50 * 1800 = 2700 C. Calculate moles of electrons: n(e-) = 2700 / 96500 = 0.02798 mol. Moles of Cu = n(e-) / 2 = 0.01399 mol. Mass of Cu = 0.01399 * 63.55 = 0.889 g.
checks: Roughly 0.028 mol e- -> 0.014 mol Cu. 0.014 * 64 ~ 0.9 g. Matches.
